channel.title: DarkScape: Runescape's latest private server
channel.description:
Jagex has decided to open yet another server: DarkScape.
The fudge is darkscape you ask? Well, it is as stupid as it sounds.
It's runescape, but with a "dark" turn. There's worldwide PvP (Gee almost like those wilderness worlds they had.. Oh, and those PVP servers people kept making). Somehow it has "three separate economies" which honestly just sounds like they're going to screw something up really fast.. Oh and of course, you get to start out at level one again.
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/c=MazZkHXs5bc/play-darkscape--free-to-play-open-world-pvp

item.title: DarkScape: Runescape's latest private server
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

They should have been looking for ideas like this instead of looking for what over the top microtransaction systems they can add back in 2011/12

They won’t be able to solve the issue all of these games struggle with, though. Killing on sight/ganking.

item.title: DarkScape: Runescape's latest private server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Jagex has decided to open yet another server: DarkScape.

The fudge is darkscape you ask? Well, it is as stupid as it sounds.

It’s runescape, but with a “dark” turn. There’s worldwide PvP (Gee almost like those wilderness worlds they had… Oh, and those PVP servers people kept making). Somehow it has “three separate economies” which honestly just sounds like they’re going to screw something up really fast…
Oh and of course, you get to start out at level one again.

RuneScape

RuneScape - MMORPG - The No.1 Free Online Multiplayer Game

Play RuneScape for free, and join a global community of millions as you complete quests and win enormous treasures in a 3D world full of magic and monsters.
